Package forsale

Class PlayerRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • forsale.PlayerRecord
  • public class PlayerRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    A record of the current state of a player in "For Sale". The player data available to a strategy in the course of a game are just copies of the true information for a player, so that manipulating them does not affect the actual player data.

      • getCards

        public java.util.List<Card> getCards()
        Returns:
        The cards held by this player at this time.

      • getCash

        public int getCash()
        Returns:
        The cash on hand for this player at this time.

      • getCurrentBid

        public int getCurrentBid()
        Returns this player's current bid in an auction. If the player has not bid yet, the value is 0. If the player has dropped out, the value will be negative.
        Returns:
        This player's current bid.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The player's name.
